dhp360-382:360: Cakkhunā saṁvaro sādhu,sādhu sotena saṁvaro;Ghānena saṁvaro sādhu,sādhu jivhāya saṁvaro.
dhp360-382:361: Kāyena saṁvaro sādhu,sādhu vācāya saṁvaro;Manasā saṁvaro sādhu,sādhu sabbattha saṁvaro;Sabbattha saṁvuto bhikkhu,sabbadukkhā pamuccati.
dhp360-382:362: Hatthasaṁyato pādasaṁyato,Vācāsaṁyato saṁyatuttamo;Ajjhattarato samāhito,Eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṁ.
dhp360-382:363: Yo mukhasaṁyato bhikkhu,mantabhāṇī anuddhato;Atthaṁ dhammañca dīpeti,madhuraṁ tassa bhāsitaṁ.
dhp360-382:364: Dhammārāmo dhammarato,dhammaṁ anuvicintayaṁ;Dhammaṁ anussaraṁ bhikkhu,saddhammā na parihāyati.
dhp360-382:365: Salābhaṁ nātimaññeyya,nāññesaṁ pihayaṁ care;Aññesaṁ pihayaṁ bhikkhu,samādhiṁ nādhigacchati.
dhp360-382:366: Appalābhopi ce bhikkhu,salābhaṁ nātimaññati;Taṁ ve devā pasaṁsanti,suddhājīviṁ atanditaṁ.
dhp360-382:367: Sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṁ,yassa natthi mamāyitaṁ;Asatā ca na socati,sa ve "bhikkhū"ti vuccati.
dhp360-382:368: Mettāvihārī yo bhikkhu,pasanno buddhasāsane;Adhigacche padaṁ santaṁ,saṅkhārūpasamaṁ sukhaṁ.
dhp360-382:369: Siñca bhikkhu imaṁ nāvaṁ,sittā te lahumessati;Chetvā rāgañca dosañca,tato nibbānamehisi.
dhp360-382:370: Pañca chinde pañca jahe,pañca cuttari bhāvaye;Pañca saṅgātigo bhikkhu,"oghatiṇṇo"ti vuccati.
dhp360-382:371: Jhāya bhikkhu mā pamādo,Mā te kāmaguṇe ramessu cittaṁ;Mā lohaguḷaṁ gilī pamatto,Mā kandi "dukkhamidan"ti dayhamāno.
dhp360-382:372: Natthi jhānaṁ apaññassa,paññā natthi ajhāyato;Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca,sa ve nibbānasantike.
dhp360-382:373: Suññāgāraṁ paviṭṭhassa,santacittassa bhikkhuno;Amānusī rati hoti,sammā dhammaṁ vipassato.
dhp360-382:374: Yato yato sammasati,khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ;Labhatī pītipāmojjaṁ,amataṁ taṁ vijānataṁ.
dhp360-382:375: Tatrāyamādi bhavati,idha paññassa bhikkhuno;Indriyagutti santuṭṭhi,pātimokkhe ca saṁvaro.
dhp360-382:376: Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe,suddhājīve atandite;Paṭisanthāravutyassa,ācārakusalo siyā;Tato pāmojjabahulo,dukkhassantaṁ karissati.
dhp360-382:377: Vassikā viya pupphāni,maddavāni pamuñcati;Evaṁ rāgañca dosañca,vippamuñcetha bhikkhavo.
dhp360-382:379: Attanā codayattānaṁ,paṭimaṁsetha attanā;So attagutto satimā,sukhaṁ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
dhp360-382:380: Attā hi attano nātho,ko hi nātho paro siyā;Attā hi attano gati,tasmā saṁyamamattānaṁ;Assaṁ bhadraṁva vāṇijo.
dhp360-382:381: Pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu,pasanno buddhasāsane;Adhigacche padaṁ santaṁ,saṅkhārūpasamaṁ sukhaṁ.
dhp360-382:382: Yo have daharo bhikkhu,yuñjati buddhasāsane;Somaṁ lokaṁ pabhāseti,abbhā muttova candimā.
